title: Tropical Cop Tales
overview: Tropical Cop Tales follows two burnt-out city cops, Keymarion "Primetime" Weeyums and Demetrius "Meechie" Franks, when they relocate to a tropical paradise for a relaxing twilight to their careers. Unfortunately, it is the most un-relaxing place on earth and their Captain is a champion shouter. Bring earplugs babe yeah?
